com.yahoo.gondola

Interface Channel

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Stoppable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MemoryChannel, NastyChannel, SocketChannel

    public interface Channel
extends Stoppable
    A channel is an abstraction that provides communication between the local member and a remote member. Communication is done via reading and writing to streams. The channel can be operational or not. When not operational, the channel will automatically try to reestablish connectivity to the remote member until it is operational again. Usage: InputStream in = null; while (true) { try { in = channel.getInputStream(in, false); in.read(); } catch (Exception e) { in = channel.getInputStream(in, true); } }

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void awaitOperational()
      Blocks until the channel is operational.
      InputStream getInputStream(InputStream in, boolean errorOccurred)
      Returns an input stream which is used to receive data from the remote member.
      OutputStream getOutputStream(OutputStream out, boolean errorOccurred)
      Returns an output stream which is used to send data to the remote member.
      String getRemoteAddress()
      Returns a human-readable string that represents the physical location of the remote member.
      int getRemoteMemberId()
      Returns the id of the remote member for this channel.
      boolean isOperational()
      Returns true if the input and output streams are valid.
      void start()
      Start all threads needed by the object.
      void stop()
      Stops all threads in the object.

      • getRemoteMemberId

        int getRemoteMemberId()
        Returns the id of the remote member for this channel.

      • getRemoteAddress

        String getRemoteAddress()
        Returns a human-readable string that represents the physical location of the remote member. This is used in dashboards to identify the remote member.
        Returns:
        a non-null string representing the remote member.

      • isOperational

      • getInputStream

        InputStream getInputStream(InputStream in,
                           boolean errorOccurred)
                    throws InterruptedException
        Returns an input stream which is used to receive data from the remote member. Blocks until a valid input stream is available.
        Parameters:
        in - the previously used input stream or null if none.
        Returns:
        a non-null input stream.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException

      • getOutputStream

        OutputStream getOutputStream(OutputStream out,
                             boolean errorOccurred)
                      throws InterruptedException
        Returns an output stream which is used to send data to the remote member. Blocks until a valid output stream is available.
        Parameters:
        out - the previously used output stream or null if none.
        Returns:
        a non-null output stream.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException
